publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2371 Stuart McMillan: Congratulations to Renfrewshire Fairtrade Steering Group—That the Parliament notes that Renfrewshire’s Fairtrade Campaign won the Fairtrade Foundation’s Outstanding Achievement Award in the 2008 Fairtrade Fortnight Awards; recognises the hard work of the Renfrewshire Fairtrade Steering Group in spreading awareness of fair trade, and congratulates the work ongoing by Renfrewshire Council to support the fair trade movement. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, Angela Constance*
S3M-2371 Congratulations to Renfrewshire Fairtrade Steering Group (lodged on 6 August 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2371 Congratulations to Renfrewshire Fairtrade Steering Group (lodged on 6 August 2008) Keith Brown*
